title: I love playing as a fighter/assassin vs tristana
body:
Love getting close to her, getting a bullet in the face and landing a mile away, then using my gapclose to get to her only having her using her W away.
Seriously. Adc with Janna peel is horrible to play against. Can we nerf her?{{champion:18}} {{champion:18}}

replies.body: Well adc players are forced to pick Tristana with all the bullshit in the game right now. Characters like Ashe and Jhin are free food for a competent, organized enemy team.

> [{quoted}](name=Zedex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pgAN5bi3,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-02-12T16:27:54.834+0000)
>
> Well adc players are forced to pick Tristana with all the bullshit in the game right now. Characters like Ashe and Jhin are free food for a competent, organized enemy team.

no they aren't, that's a fucked up thing to say. there's excellent ADC options that aren't Tristana Bullshit.

There are basically 4 ADC's you play right now: {{champion:81}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:67}} 

They make up almost 50% of ADC picks in games. So basically one of the two ADC's is going to play one of them in every game.
Same goes for every role tho, thats what meta means

Kinda? But Marksmen get it ***way*** more than any other role. For other roles, there are usually periods where there's a meta trinity but typically diversity stretches out. This is a constant for the Marksmen though, and the difference is usually more pronounced.

This is in large part because in other roles, champions often aren't *strictly worse* than the meta counterparts. There is 'an' thing a tier 2 jungle can do that a tier 1 cannot, or a tier 2 mid's long range poke speciality that none of the tier 1s have (varying based on the current meta).

For Marksmen... so much of their power budget is wrapped up in items and steroids that they're *functionally* the same champion. Each has a gimmick or two, but those usually take 1 game to learn each, but the furthest difference between any two marksmen is basically the difference between Lux and Syndra.

This 4 rather 

{{champion:96}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:498}} {{champion:110}}
nah kog nerfs were pretty hard

Nope they werent

Kog nerfs are hit in advance for upcoming wits buff anyway

What nerfs
A fucking dog alien is getting buffed :^)
I'm not really into the meta but isn't Xayah good? Just asking.
She's alright but not as good as the top 4. I think like a 51% win rate or something

> [{quoted}](name=Bob the Toastr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pgAN5bi3,comment-id=00060000000000020000,timestamp=2018-02-12T19:46:46.199+0000)
>
> She's alright but not as good as the top 4. I think like a 51% win rate or something

She's in the top 4. Vayne is old news, as is Ezreal.

{{champion:81}} is broken because of klepto and lack of early defenses bot lane, he doesnt have similar problems to almost any other ADC because he doesnt build or play like them.  He just abuses klepto to get a large gold lead even if you are even in lane, and then uses that item advantage to win

{{champion:18}} overloaded in every sense of the word.  Highest range, one of the largest AS increases ON DEMAND, wave clear, self peel and mobility.  There isnt a downside to picking her.

{{champion:110}} the most balanced of the 4, but is similar to kog'maw in how he uses AS on hit to shred everything

{{champion:67}} Is either 100% pick ban or unplayable depending on her numbers, right now she is strong so she is 100% pick/ban.  Horrible champ design overall

>{{champion:67}}   Is either 100% pick ban or unplayable depending on her numbers, right now she is strong so she is 100% pick/ban. Horrible champ design overall

Vayne 100% pick/ban atm. OMEGALUL

> [{quoted}](name=IvernBramblefoot,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pgAN5bi3,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-02-12T16:49:20.986+0000)
>
> no they aren't, that's a fucked up thing to say. there's excellent ADC options that aren't Tristana Bullshit.

Yea, like Kogmaw bullshit! Jinx is great too.

You jump on her she presses e auto r auto, you jump again she auto w's, you jump AGAIN and she auto w's out again, then let's say by some miracle you have 4 gap closers SHE STILL HAS FLASH. God that champion is "fun" to play against.

How is Tristana getting all of those resets? She only gets a reset if she scores a takedown on one of your teammates or if she's managed to fully stack an E on an enemy champion (which takes 4 seconds or 4 auto attacks).

"All of those resets"? She w's once and procs her e which gives her a second w... The first gap close is denied by e auto r auto, the second is denied by auto w, then a third gap close is the final auto for e to explode and she gets a w reset.
I dont know where your getting the third gap close.
I'm saying she has people jump on her 3 times and she can self peel herself 3 times. Ult, w, and w reset.
Okay that is what I thought.

4 autoattacks=4 seconds for tristana. 
And that shit gets 10 upvotes.
'4 seconds' that's a lot more than it takes to burst anything nowadays, especially with a champion building crit.

> [{quoted}](name=nm1010,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pgAN5bi3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-12T14:20:31.567+0000)
>
> You jump on her she presses e auto r auto, you jump again she auto w's, you jump AGAIN and she auto w's out again, then let's say by some miracle you have 4 gap closers SHE STILL HAS FLASH. God that champion is "fun" to play against.

At least it's not pre-rework Tristana, where she had an even longer range to play safe with, though I could be wrong, I never played her pre-rework.
She was less broken pre-rework. She scaled worss, didn’t actually have longer range, and all her abilities only had ap scalings.

Never forget season 4 when Tristana was tied for the longest resetabble jump, longest knockback, longest AA range and highest burst in the game.
Tristana has always been bullshit, but for some reason it's allowed for Ranged champions to have inherently unfair kits meanwhile if a melee has an annoying kit permanent QQQQQQ ensues.

Because ranged kits (especially *marksman* kits), when unfair, still generally have the counterplay of "they're fucked if you manage to close".

When a melee kit is unfair, generally you *can't* keep in range. You get jumped to and stat-checked to death.

Tristana's unfair because she's hard to kill. When Udyr's viable, he's impossible to kill, and impossible to get away from.

Implying melees don’t get fucked if they are in range of other champions?

People seem to think that ranged has a weakness just because they die when people get close. WELL SO DO MELEES. Like what the actual fuck. Melees not instantly dying is becuase they ARE FORCED to build tanky so they can close in. It’s not an attribute of being a melee. Maybe if ranged built defensive items perhaps they wouldn’t die when people jump that.

"Implying melees don’t get fucked if they are in range of other champions?"

Most don't, if they're fed.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pgAN5bi3,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2018-02-12T18:01:44.157+0000)

> Tristana's unfair because she's hard to kill. When Udyr's viable, he's impossible to kill, and impossible to get away from.

Trying to get away from Tristana in a snowballed teamfight???
Ha, are we playing the same game?

Tristana is nasty right now. Imagine having to lane against her.

ADC players don't find her fun either... except maybe if they're the ones playing Trist.

I'm kinda in the middle since Tristana is far from being my main, in fact she's my 8th adc but sometimes I like to play her and against her. 
This may be an unpopular opinion but I like when Tristana is meta.
You just explained how cancerous {{champion:114}}  is. Build full ad and is tanky enough to tank every ult from enemy and live long enough for a team to arrive. 1vs4

> [{quoted}](name=OP Garen Support,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pgAN5bi3,comment-id=000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-02-13T23:08:30.691+0000)

Well she is supposed to do well in 1 vs 1 duels xD she was meant to be a counter to tanks just like how Zed counters mages , Zed is a nightmare for mages , same way Fiora is a nightmare for tanks , in my case since I main mages , I really prefer if the enemy top laner goes Fiora , our Top laner might not be able to win or to be much helpful against her but for a mage , Fiora is easier to kill than a tank :(
Alistar can't auto when he headbutts people away from him, Tristana shouldn't be able to crit me twice while im stunned by her ult.

In what Aspect is Tristana weak?

#NONE IMO
